title: Introduction to Desired Capabilities in Katalon Studio
description: Desired capabilities are key/value pairs that tell the browser   properties such as browser name, browser version, and the path of   the browser driver in the system to determine the browsers'   behaviors at runtime. Desired capabilities which can be used to   configure such additional driver instances as FirefoxDriver,   ChromeDriver, InternetExplorerDriver, Selenium WebDriver are useful   in the following cases:
